name: Advanced Installer Updates Configuration File
summary: Learn about .AIU files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: AIU files are saved in a plain text format and begin with the line:

All AIU files contain the name of the program, the URL of the latest installer, the file size, and the path to the installation directory. They may also include a description of the installer, a list of features, bug fixes, the registry key, and the number of the current version.

description: Configuration file that contains information about an update to a program installed with Advanced Installer; typically provided to clients via a software company's website; used to check if users have the latest version of the software installed and provides updates if necessary.
